attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our great President 😍😍 because I want to make America Great again. I downloaded this and my whole camera roll was filled with such vile videos of Trump being racist and homophobic and sexist which I CAN NOT BELIEVE. FAKE NEWS!!!! Never Get This App. 👎👎👎
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: God where do I begin it took 7 Business days to install like really ? And all I wanted was to show how much I love this county and are great president 😣😢😭🇱🇷 but the app told me liberals weren’t allowed in so I had to leave ...Bernie 2020 💅
attributes.title: I would give this 0 starts if I could >:(

attributes.review: This app took very long to download I was disappointed in the quality also, like I’ve never seen such a bad app. When I get on it, it’s blank I do not recommend downloading it!
attributes.title: Do not recommend downloading!!!

attributes.review: I went into cardiac arrest after opening this app. it was impossible to navigate. i’m sitting in my hospital bed hoping that I can save people from having the same experience that i just had. stay safe 😔
attributes.title: cardiac arrest

attributes.review: I would like to say first that this app takes FOREVER TO DOWNLOAD 🙃, Secondly it takes up so much space my poor iphone just couldnt take it anymore. The app is absolutely horrible and should be taken off :((((
attributes.title: Absolutely a waste of time

attributes.review: It just makes sense that Trump would create such a disgusting and useless app! Please remove immediately!!! This app along with who it supports only spreads hate and negativity!! WE NEED CHANGE! We cannot allow him to keep terrorizing this country!
attributes.title: Ignorant imbecile!

attributes.review: This app is complete garbage. After the 2 day it took for it to download it wouldn’t even work. I just wanted to support my president and he doesn’t even put the effort in to make the app work I’m truly disappointed.
attributes.title: Didapointed

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my phone started to crash. It then began to burn up and eventually explode. Thank goodness I got a new one so I can leave a review for this TERRIBLE, AWFUL, HORRIBLE, HORRIFIC, DREADFUL, DISGUSTING GHASTLY, app. The worst part about this...is that my gold fish had a heart attack and drowned in his OWN BOWL. I will miss you gibby. 😢

This app was absolute trash from start to present. 2016-now absolute trash and shouldn’t be remade or shouldn’t have even be downloaded in the first place. I don’t know how it was even downloaded in the first place. Not my app.
attributes.title: Not my app

attributes.review: Very good will download again worth the 37 hour wait
attributes.title: Very good
